lessons.japanese: 気難しい人は、からかうとすぐ腹を立てる。
lessons.english: It is easy to get the cranky man's goat by teasing him.

lessons.japanese: トムはジョンが方言を使うのでいつもからかう。
lessons.english: Tom always makes fun of John because of his dialect.

lessons.japanese: トムはいつもジョンの言葉のなまりを理由にからかう。
lessons.english: Tom always makes fun of John because of his dialect.

lessons.japanese: ジョンは自分の犬をからかう。
lessons.english: John makes fun of his dog.

lessons.japanese: ジミーは友達が自分をからかうことに慣れていた。
lessons.english: Jimmy was accustomed to his friends making fun of him.

lessons.japanese: 老人をからかうのはよくない。
lessons.english: It is wrong to make fun of an old man.

lessons.japanese: 大人をからかうなんて生意気だ。
lessons.english: It is impudent of you to make fun of adults.

lessons.japanese: 上司を人前でからかうのは無礼なことです。
lessons.english: It's rude to make fun of your boss in public.

lessons.japanese: 気難しい人は、からかうとすぐ腹を立てる。
lessons.english: It is easy to get the cranky man's goat by teasing him.

lessons.japanese: 気難しい人は、からかうとすぐ腹を立てる。
lessons.english: That grump is quick to blow his top when you tease him.
